card_text: 1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters$NDuring your turn, when an Equip Spell(s) becomes equipped to this card: You can draw 1 card. You can only use this effect of "Power Tool Mecha Dragon" once per turn. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can target 1 appropriate face-up Equip Card on the field; equip that target to this card.
